title: The new screenthing.
body: How to i get the normal/old League Of Legends Screen back after downloading this new one, didnt like it that much sorry.

replies.body:
You can launch the Legacy Client from the login screen of the Beta Client, as shown below:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

I hope this helped!
